name: Farewell, Forever
description:
Farewell, Forever is a game about a therapist who is trying to help her sister to come out of her mental issues, she has to go through a lot of puzzles in the mysterious world of mental issues that her sister has.

 

Use arrow keys to move up, down, left, right.

With each move you make, you use one move, if your movement counter reaches 0 before you finish the level, you lose the level and have to replay it until you solve it.

To play and download the game, you will have to follow these simple steps :

Press the download button below, after you do that and the .zip file is download it, right click it, and click "extract" using your preferred unzipping  software (7zip, the built-in windows unzipping system, exec).

Once you do that, double click FarewellForever.exe, and after that the game will start!

Feel free to donate if you liked the game, not necessary, but you would be supporting us, and supporting indie developers (not just us) is good in general if you enjoy their products! ^-^

Have fun!
